title: Rihanna Takes the Dress-Over-Pants Trend to the Next Level
text:
Rihanna has a way of making even the most outlandish fashions seem wearable. Her ever-evolving style means constant changes, especially when she’s traveling abroad. Currently in Seoul, where she’s celebrating Fenty Beauty’s South Korean launch, the star has had fun wearing CEO-worthy suits as well as dresses fresh from the Spring 2020 runways. While touring the Itaewon shopping district on Wednesday, she even found time to tackle a tricky trend. She wore a hot pink gown from Jacquemus’s 10th-anniversary collection over a pair of highlighter orange cargo pants, making eccentric layering seem sexy and effortless.

Dresses worn over pants are far from a new concept—anyone who lived through the 90s and early 00s can tell you as much—but Rihanna’s version felt fresh. Her floor-length gown with spaghetti straps and delicate buttons would have looked right at home on the red carpet, but the sportiness of her baggy trousers added an unexpected athletic twist. Polished off with a pair of pointy sandals from her Fenty line, the look was another chic addition to her Seoul wardrobe.

Originally Appeared on Vogue
description: Who says you can't wear a dress with pants?
